author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-TABLE-Japan Retail Fund Investment-6 MTH results
text: (Company corrects revenues forecast figure for 6 months to Feb 28, 2019 to "30.80" from "30.77". This table was released in April 16.)
